title: Serenity in the Bamboo Mist
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed 2D anime illustration, 16:9 aspect ratio. A cute, smiling giant panda sitting calmly on a mossy stream bank, joyfully eating a large bunch of fresh bamboo leaves. The setting is a dense, mystical bamboo forest shrouded in thick, beautiful mist and ethereal volumetric light. Tall, vibrant green bamboo stalks dominate the foreground and sides. Ancient, moss-covered trees fade into the background fog. Subtle glowing particles (fireflies or magic dust) drift through the air. Serene atmosphere, smooth shading, cinematic lighting, lush environment.
negativePrompt: low quality, worst quality, ugly, blurry, deformed, poorly drawn face, bad hands, low resolution, multiple pandas, noise, artifacts, extra limbs
